00026 template<int M>
00027 MeasurementMatrix<M>::MeasurementMatrix(const CorrespondenceSet &corrs) {
00028   CorrespondenceSet::const_iterator cSet;
00029   CorrespondenceSet::EquivalenceClass::const_iterator setMember;
00030   int j;
00031   Base::resize(corrs.size());
00032   Base::setZero();
00033   
00034   j = 0;
00035   for(cSet = corrs.begin(); cSet != corrs.end(); ++cSet) {
00036     for(setMember = cSet->begin(); setMember != cSet->end(); ++setMember) {
00037       pixel(setMember->id, j)(0) = setMember->x;
00038       pixel(setMember->id, j)(1) = setMember->y;
00039       pixel(setMember->id, j)(2) = 1.0;
00040     }
00041     ++j;
00042   }
00043 }

00066 template<int M>
00067 bool MeasurementMatrix<M>::load(const char *filename) {
00068   std::ifstream         myFile(filename);
00069   Correspondence        c;
00070   GPixel                currentProjPixel;
00071   int                   points;
00072   int                   currentCol;
00073   const double          p = 0.002; // probability of loading point
00074   const int             cameras = 5;
00075 
00076   if(!myFile) return(false);
00077   std::cout << "Loading correspondences" << std::endl;
00078 
00079   // --- count number of 3D points
00080   currentProjPixel.id = -1;
00081   points = 0;
00082   while(myFile >> c) {
00083     if(c.i != currentProjPixel) {
00084       currentProjPixel = c.i;
00085       ++points;
00086     }
00087   }
00088   std::cout <<"Found "<< points <<" points" << std::endl;
00089   Base::resize(3*M, points);
00090 
00091   // ### scan back to beginning of file ###
00092   myFile.clear();
00093   myFile.seekg(0, std::ios::beg);
00094 
00095   // --- form columns one by one
00096   // --- assuming file is ordered
00097   // --- by projector pixels.
00098   currentProjPixel.id = -1;
00099   currentCol = 0;
00100   myFile >> c;
00101   while(myFile) {
00102     if((rand()*1.0/RAND_MAX) < p) {
00103       currentProjPixel = c.i;
00104 
00105       c.i.id += cameras; // test
00106 
00107       pixel(c.i.id, currentCol)(0) = c.i.x;
00108       pixel(c.i.id, currentCol)(1) = c.i.y;
00109       pixel(c.i.id, currentCol)(2) = 1.0;
00110 
00111       //      std::cout << currentProjPixel << std::endl;
00112 
00113       do {
00114         c.j.y *= 0.75;  // test
00115         c.j.id -= 1;    // test
00116         
00117         pixel(c.j.id, currentCol)(0) = c.j.x;
00118         pixel(c.j.id, currentCol)(1) = c.j.y;
00119         pixel(c.j.id, currentCol)(2) = 1.0;
00120 
00121         myFile >> c;
00122       } while(myFile && c.i == currentProjPixel);
00123       ++currentCol;
00124     } else {
00125       // skip 3D point
00126       while(myFile >> c && c.i == currentProjPixel) {;}
00127     }
00128   }
00129   Base::conservativeResize(3*M, currentCol);
00130   std::cout <<"Loaded "<< currentCol <<" points" << std::endl;
00131   myFile.close();
00132   return(true);
00133 }

00149 template<int M>
00150 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::normalise(ImageTransform<M> &denormalisation,
00151                                      bool fixedAspect) {
00152   Eigen::Vector3d mean;
00153   Eigen::Vector2d sd;
00154   Eigen::Matrix3d K;
00155   int v;
00156   int point;
00157 
00158   unscale();
00159   K.setZero();
00160   for(v = 0; v < M; ++v) {
00161     mean = view(v).rowwise().sum();
00162     sd   = view(v).topRows(2).rowwise().squaredNorm();
00163     if(mean(2) == 0.0) mean(2) = 1.0; // no data for view
00164     sd   /= mean(2);
00165     mean /= mean(2);
00166     sd = (sd - mean.cwiseProduct(mean).topRows(2));
00167     if(fixedAspect) {
00168       sd(0) = sd(1) = (sd(0) + sd(1))*0.5;
00169     }
00170     sd = sd.cwiseSqrt();
00171 
00172     if(sd(0) == 0.0) sd(0) = 1.0;
00173     if(sd(1) == 0.0) sd(1) = 1.0;
00174 
00175     K(0,0) = 1.0/sd(0);
00176     K(1,1) = 1.0/sd(1);
00177     K(0,2) = -mean(0)/sd(0);
00178     K(1,2) = -mean(1)/sd(1);
00179     K(2,2) = 1.0;    
00180     view(v) = K*view(v);
00181 
00182     // --- form inverse
00183     K(0,0) = sd(0);
00184     K(1,1) = sd(1);
00185     K(0,2) = mean(0);
00186     K(1,2) = mean(1);
00187     denormalisation.view(v) = K;
00188   }
00189 }

00197 template<int M>
00198 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::scale_and_fill(const MotionMatrix<M> &P, 
00199                                           const ShapeMatrix &X) {
00200   int i,j;
00201 
00202   for(j = 0; j<cols(); ++j) {
00203     for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00204       if(pixel_is_occluded(i,j)) {
00205         pixel(i,j) = P.view(i) * X.col(j);
00206       } else {
00207         pixel(i,j) *= (P.view(i).row(2) * X.col(j))/pixel(i,j)(2);
00208       }
00209     }
00210   }
00211 }

00219 template<int M>
00220 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::add_correspondence(const Correspondence &corr) {
00221   int icolumn = column_containing(corr.i);
00222   int jcolumn = column_containing(corr.j);
00223 
00224   if(icolumn < 0) {
00225     if(jcolumn < 0) {                    // neither exist yet
00226       icolumn = new_column();
00227       insert_pixel(icolumn, corr.i);
00228       insert_pixel(icolumn, corr.j);      
00229     } else {                            // j exists, i doesn't
00230       insert_pixel(jcolumn, corr.i);
00231       return(jcolumn);
00232     }
00233   } else {
00234     if(jcolumn < 0) {                    // i exists, j doesn't
00235       insert_pixel(icolumn, corr.j);
00236     } else {                            // both exist
00237       merge_columns(icolumn, jcolumn);
00238     }
00239   }
00240   return(icolumn);
00241 
00242 }

00252 template<int M>
00253 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::column_containing(const GPixel &G) {
00254   int j;
00255   for(j = 0; j<cols(); ++j) {
00256     if(fabs(pixel(G.id, j)(0) - G.x) < 1e-5 &&
00257        fabs(pixel(G.id, j)(1) - G.y) < 1e-5) {
00258       return(j);
00259     }
00260   }
00261   return(-1);
00262 }

00271 template<int M>
00272 typename MeasurementMatrix<M>::ViewRef MeasurementMatrix<M>::view(int i) {
00273   return(middleRows(3*i,3));
00274 }

00290 template<int M>
00291 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::synthesise_measurements(const MotionMatrix<M> &P, 
00292                                                   int pts, double noise) {
00293   ShapeMatrix           X;
00294   Eigen::Matrix4d       shift;
00295   int                   i,j;
00296 
00297   // --- fill X with homogeneous 3D points centred around origin
00298   X.resize(4,pts);
00299   for(i = 0; i<3; ++i) {
00300     for(j = 0; j<X.cols(); ++j) {
00301       X(i,j) = rand()*2.0/RAND_MAX - 1.0;
00302     }
00303   }
00304   X.row(3).fill(1.0);
00305   
00306   // --- shift centre to (0,0,1.5)
00307   shift = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
00308   shift(2,3) = 1.5;
00309   X = shift*X;
00310 
00311   // --- form matrix and add noise
00312   (*this) = P*X;
00313   unscale();
00314   for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00315     for(j = 0; j<cols(); ++j) {
00316       (*this)(3*i,j) += 2.0*rand()*noise/RAND_MAX - noise;
00317       (*this)(3*i+1,j) += 2.0*rand()*noise/RAND_MAX - noise;
00318     }
00319   }
00320 }

00328 template<int M>
00329 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::synthesise_occlusions(double proportion) {
00330   int i,j;
00331   for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00332     for(j=0; j<cols(); ++j) {
00333       if(rand()*1.0/RAND_MAX <= proportion) {
00334         pixel(i,j).fill(0.0);
00335       }
00336     }
00337   }
00338 }
00339 
00340 
00346 template<int M>
00347 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::unscale() {
00348   int i,j;
00349   
00350   for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00351     for(j = 0; j<cols(); ++j) {
00352       if(!pixel_is_occluded(i,j)) {
00353         pixel(i,j)(0) /= pixel(i,j)(2);
00354         pixel(i,j)(1) /= pixel(i,j)(2);
00355         pixel(i,j)(2) = 1.0;
00356       }
00357     }
00358   }
00359 }

00372 MeasurementMatrix<M>::pixel(int view, int point) {
00373   return(Base::template block<3,1>(view*3,point));

00376 typename MeasurementMatrix<M>::constPixelRef
00377 MeasurementMatrix<M>::pixel(int view, int point) const {
00378   return(Base::template block<3,1>(view*3,point));

00386 template<int M>
00387 bool MeasurementMatrix<M>::pixel_is_occluded(int view, int point) const {
00388   double scale = pixel(view, point)(2);
00389   return(scale == 0.0);// && std::signbit(scale) == 0);
00390 }

00399 template<int M>
00400 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::new_column() {
00401   Base::conservativeResize(Eigen::NoChange, cols()+1);
00402   return(cols()-1);
00403 }

00411 template<int M>
00412 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::new_columns(int n) {
00413   Base::conservativeResize(Eigen::NoChange, cols()+n);
00414   return(cols()-n);

00445 template<int M>
00446 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::insert_column_and_expand(ColXpr c) {
00447   int   i,j,k;
00448   int   extracols;
00449   bool  fullyExpand[M];
00450   bool  pixelExpand[M];
00451 
00452   // --- First calculate how many cols to insert
00453   extracols = 1;
00454   for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00455     if(c(3*i+2) == 0.0 && !is_fully_expanded(i)) {
00456       if(std::signbit(c(3*i+2)) == 0) {
00457         // --- full expansion
00458         fullyExpand[i] = true;
00459         pixelExpand[i] = false;
00460         extracols += 3;
00461       } else {
00462         // --- Pixel expansion
00463         fullyExpand[i] = false;
00464         pixelExpand[i] = true;
00465         ++extracols;
00466       }
00467     } else {
00468       // --- no expansion
00469       fullyExpand[i] = false;
00470       pixelExpand[i] = false;
00471     }
00472   }
00473 
00474   // --- now insert cols and fill
00475   k = j = new_columns(extracols);
00476   col(j) = c;
00477   ++j;
00478   for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00479     if(fullyExpand[i]) {
00480       middleCols(j,3).fill(0.0);
00481       (*this)(3*i   , j  ) = 1.0;
00482       (*this)(3*i+1 , j+1) = 1.0;
00483       (*this)(3*i+2 , j+2) = 1.0;
00484       j += 3;
00485     }
00486     else if(pixelExpand[i]) {
00487       col(j).fill(0.0);
00488       col(j)(3*i+2) = 1.0;
00489       col(j).middleRows(3*i,2) = c.middleRows(3*i,2);
00490       col(k).middleRows(3*i,3).fill(0.0);
00491       ++j;
00492     }
00493   }
00494   return(k);
00495 }

00512 template<int M>
00513 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::insert_columns(ColsBlockXpr c) {
00514   int initialCols = cols();
00515 
00516   conservativeResize(Eigen::NoChange, initialCols + c.cols());  
00517   middleCols(initialCols, c.cols()) = c;
00518   return(initialCols);
00519 }

00525 template<int M>
00526 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::delete_column(int i) {
00527   while(i < cols()-1) {
00528     col(i) = col(i+1);
00529   }
00530   conservativeResize(Eigen::NoChange, cols()-1);
00531 }

00537 template<int M>
00538 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::delete_columns(int i, int n) {
00539   while(i < cols()-n) {
00540     col(i) = col(i+n);
00541   }
00542   conservativeResize(Eigen::NoChange, cols()-n);
00543 }

00551 template<int M>
00552 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::insert_pixel(int col, const GPixel &p) {
00553   pixel(p.id, col)(0) = p.x;
00554   pixel(p.id, col)(1) = p.y;
00555   pixel(p.id, col)(2) = 1.0;
00556 }
00557 
00563 template<int M>
00564 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::merge_columns(int j1, int j2) {
00565   // --- copy pixels from j2 to j1
00566   for(int i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00567     if(pixel(i,j1)(2) == 0.0 && pixel(i,j2)(2) != 0.0) {
00568       pixel(i,j1) = pixel(i,j2);
00569     }
00570   }
00571   delete_column(j2);
00572 }

00580 template<int M>
00581 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::rank(double threshold) {
00582   int i;
00583   Eigen::JacobiSVD<Base> svd(*this);
00584 
00585   if(svd.singularValues().size() == 0) return(0);
00586 
00587   threshold *= fabs(svd.singularValues()(0));
00588   i = 1;
00589   while(i < svd.singularValues().size() && 
00590         fabs(svd.singularValues()(i)) > threshold)
00591     ++i;
00592   return(i);
00593 }

00602 template<int M>
00603 bool MeasurementMatrix<M>::is_fully_expanded(int view) {
00604   int j;
00605 
00606   for(j = 0; j<cols(); ++j) {
00607     if(pixel(view, j)(2) == 0.0 && pixel(view, j)(0) == 1.0) return(true);
00608   }
00609   return(false);
00610 }

00616 template<class D>
00617 MeasurementMatrix<M> &MeasurementMatrix<M>::operator=(const Eigen::MatrixBase<D> &o) {
00618   Base::operator =(o);
00619   return(*this);
